mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE domain ( id IDENTITY ,name TEXT NOT NULL ,format TEXT ,description TEXT ,existential TEXT ,created TIMESTAMP ,updated TIMESTAMP )
CREATE TABLE domain_meta_user ( id IDENTITY, created_by BIGINT, updated_by BIGINT )
mapper.select: SELECT main.id as id, main.name as name, main.format as format, main.description as description, main.existential as existential, main.created as created, main.updated as updated, meta.created_by as created_by, meta.updated_by as updated_by FROM domain main LEFT JOIN domain_meta_user meta ON main.id = meta.id ORDER BY main.id
